Info1.Description: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.

Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.

Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than {s:LowHealthEnemyThresholdPct}% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.

Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to crash down early.
Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them for a short time. When the lift ends, the target receives Telekinesis damage.
Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them. Once it's finished, enemies get knocked into the air.
{s:hero_name} freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy. During the flurry, {s:hero_name} gains a fire rate bonus and will evade some of the bullets shot at her.

Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for {s:BouncePadExtendDuration}s during the first usage of a bounce pad.

Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain +{s:BonusDamagePctPerPlayerHit}% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit.
Hold [{s:key_alt_cast}] to cast a Sticky Bomb on yourself.
Cast yourself in shadow and go Invisible. Attacks do not break invisibility but they will temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)

After {s:AbilityCastDelay}s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate the owl.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo, you permanently gain max health.
Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal {s:Damage} damage to them.

Info2.Description: Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.

Info1.Description:
Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. {s:hero_name} and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals {s:AllyOutgoingDamagePercent}% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
[{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate flying speed.
[{s:iv_attack2}] to drop ally/bomb.

After charging for {s:AbilityCastDelay}s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet resist.

Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation, your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster, your weapon has infinite ammo, and you gain damage resists and immunity to negative status effects. You are unable to die in this mode.

Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.

Apply damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
Launch a slow projectile that you can activate anywhere along its path to detonate it, dealing damage to enemies caught in its radius. Deals bonus damage for each additional hero hit.
